      • undoMove

        protected void undoMove(Move m,
                        int blueNow,
                        int blueNext,
                        int redNow,
                        int redNext)
        Method to undo moves
        Parameters:
        m - Move that should be undone
        blueNow - number of blue pieces before the move
        blueNext - number of blue pieces after the move
        redNow - number of red pieces before the move
        redNext - number of red pieces after the move
